'''Travels of the Moonlight Venturer''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula]] at [[Luhua Pool]].

==Steps==
# Cross the bridge and fight 5 Treasure Hoarders.{{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer*2;Treasure Hoarders: Handyman;Treasure Hoarders: Scout}}
# Activate the mechanism and cross the 2 bridges.
# Fight 3 Treasure Hoarders. There is a Common Chest here.{{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer*2}}
# Activate the mechanism and glide upwards using the wind current.
# Fight 3 Treasure Hoarders. There is another Common Chest here.{{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Marksman;Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2}}
# Jump across vanishing platforms to reach a permanent mid-point platform.
#* Move to the edge and wait until the last second before jumping to the next platform.
# (Optional) Glide over to another permanent platform to the left. There is an Exquisite Chest here.
# (Optional) Use the pressure plate to activate the vanishing platforms to return to the mid-point platform.
# Jump across vanishing platforms to reach the final area.
# Defeat the enemies.{{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist*2}}
# Go up the stairs and fight 5 Treasure Hoarders, followed by 1 Fatui Pyro Agent and 4 Treasure Hoarders. There is a Precious Chest here.
#* Wave 1{{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer*2;Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer*2;Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger}}
#* Wave 2{{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent;Treasure Hoarders: Crusher;Treasure Hoarders: Scout;Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer*2}}
